<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bravery Baldric](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2309)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 145 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _bravery baldric_ is a belt that wraps around the shoulder and draws on your well of courage. When you critically succeed on a save against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect or reduce your [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition to 0, the baldric gains 1 charge, which slightly alters the color. A _bravery baldric_ can hold up to 2 charges, and its charges reset to 0 when you invest it. You can have only one _bravery baldric_ invested at a time.

Bravery Baldric (Fleet)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The baldric is grass green when charged, and it grants you the effects of [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=122). This baldric has the [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157) trait.
